title: pytorch stuck when doing operation combined with numpy
body_html:
a = np.ones((64, 3, 224, 224))
mean = np.asarray([0.485, 0.456, 0.406], dtype=np.float32)
mean.resize((1, 3, 1, 1))
std = np.asarray([0.229, 0.224, 0.225], dtype=np.float32)
std.resize((1, 3, 1, 1))
mean = Variable(torch.from_numpy(mean)).cuda()
std = Variable(torch.from_numpy(std)).cuda()

# %%debug
b = a - mean

when executing the code above, the program stucks.

does anyone know why?

  • OS:Linux 3.10.0-327.22.2.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Thu Jun 23 17:05:11 UTC 2016 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
  • PyTorch version:0.3.1.post2
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): conda
  • Python version: 2.7.13 |Anaconda custom (64-bit)| (default, Dec 20 2016, 23:09:15) \n[GCC 4.4.7 20120313 (Red Hat 4.4.7-1)]
  • CUDA/cuDNN version:nvcc: Cuda compilation tools, release 7.5, V7.5.17 CUDNN: 7.05
    Numpy version: 1.12.1
body_text:
a = np.ones((64, 3, 224, 224))
mean = np.asarray([0.485, 0.456, 0.406], dtype=np.float32)
mean.resize((1, 3, 1, 1))
std = np.asarray([0.229, 0.224, 0.225], dtype=np.float32)
std.resize((1, 3, 1, 1))
mean = Variable(torch.from_numpy(mean)).cuda()
std = Variable(torch.from_numpy(std)).cuda()

# %%debug
b = a - mean

when executing the code above, the program stucks.
does anyone know why?

body:
```
a = np.ones((64, 3, 224, 224))
mean = np.asarray([0.485, 0.456, 0.406], dtype=np.float32)
mean.resize((1, 3, 1, 1))
std = np.asarray([0.229, 0.224, 0.225], dtype=np.float32)
std.resize((1, 3, 1, 1))
mean = Variable(torch.from_numpy(mean)).cuda()
std = Variable(torch.from_numpy(std)).cuda()

# %%debug
b = a - mean
```
when executing the code above, the program stucks.

does anyone know why?
